accuracy.title: Accuracy ‚Äî 70%
accuracy.desc1: On average, our algorithm correctly predicts the outcome of a match 70% of the time.
accuracy.desc2: Out of 10 matches, it gets 7 right.

auc.title: AUC ‚Äî 0.76
auc.desc1: AUC measures the model's ability to correctly distinguish winners and losers.
auc.desc2: With a score of 0.76, the algorithm is very reliable in detecting winning trends.

logloss.title: LogLoss ‚Äî 0.57
logloss.desc1: LogLoss measures the quality of our algorithm's probabilistic predictions.
logloss.desc2: A score of 0.57 indicates excellent probability calibration.

valueBet.title: What is a "value bet"?
valueBet.intro: A value bet is simply an opportunity where the odds offered by the bookmaker are higher than the true probability you calculate (or our algorithm calculates for you).
valueBet.formula: If the offered odds are greater than 1 / Estimated probability, then you have a value bet!

example.title: Concrete example
example.scenario: Let's take a fictional Worlds 2025 match:
example.bookmaker: The bookmaker gives odds of 2.20 for T1 to win.
example.algorithm: Our algorithm estimates T1 has a 50% chance of winning (real probability = 0.50).
example.calculation: If T1 has a 50% chance of winning, the "fair odds" should be:
example.conclusion: So here, the offered odds (2.20) are higher than the fair odds (2.00) ‚Üí This is a value bet!
example.explanation: By betting on T1 at 2.20, you're in a favorable position in the long run, as the odds overestimate your potential winnings compared to the real risk.

story.title: Our story
story.text1: PredictEsport was born from a shared passion for esports and data science. As a long-time fan of League of Legends and other competitive games, I've always been fascinated by the strategic complexity of these matches.
story.text2: With expertise in data analysis and machine learning, I decided to create a tool that would allow fans and bettors to make more informed decisions. Our algorithm analyzes thousands of match data points to identify trends and predict results with impressive accuracy.
story.text3: Our mission is simple: make esports analysis accessible to everyone and help our community better understand the game they love.
